children.name: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.
We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.
The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ...

Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.
• Description Google Recaptcha service sets this cookie to identify bots to protect the website against malicious spam attacks.

• Description CookieYes sets this cookie to remember users' consent preferences so that their preferences are respected on subsequent visits to this site. It does not collect or store any personal information about the site visitors.

CookieYes sets this cookie to remember users' consent preferences so that their preferences are respected on subsequent visits to this site. It does not collect or store any personal information about the site visitors.
Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features.
• Description Polylang sets this cookie to remember the language the user selects when returning to the website and get the language information when unavailable in another way.
Polylang sets this cookie to remember the language the user selects when returning to the website and get the language information when unavailable in another way.
Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.
• Description Google Analytics sets this cookie to store and count page views.
Google Analytics sets this cookie to store and count page views.

• Description Google Analytics sets this cookie to calculate visitor, session and campaign data and track site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognise unique visitors.

Google Analytics sets this cookie to calculate visitor, session and campaign data and track site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognise unique visitors.
Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors.
Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with customized advertisements based on the pages you visited previously and to analyze the effectiveness of the ad campaigns.
Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet.

Welcome to LearnGo (“we,” “our,” or “us”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe and secure experience on our website (“Website”). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our Website. By using our Website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
Information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other details submitted through contact forms, account registration, or subscription services
Information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other details submitted through contact forms, account registration, or subscription services.
Automatically collected data, including but not limited to, your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, and usage patterns through cookies and analytics tools.
When integrating with Google services such as Google Meet, we may access specific Google user data authorized by you, including:
• Basic profile information (e.g., name, email address).
Basic profile information (e.g., name, email address).
• Access to calendar events to facilitate scheduling.
Access to calendar events to facilitate scheduling.
• Permissions necessary for live collaboration features (e.g., accessing meeting details).
Permissions necessary for live collaboration features (e.g., accessing meeting details).
We use the information collected for various purposes, including:
• Providing, operating, and maintaining our Website and services.
Providing, operating, and maintaining our Website and services.
• Communicating with you about updates, promotions, and service-related issues.
Communicating with you about updates, promotions, and service-related issues.
• Enhancing the security and functionality of our Website.
Enhancing the security and functionality of our Website.
• Complying with legal obligations and enforcing our terms and policies.
Complying with legal obligations and enforcing our terms and policies.
• Integrating with third-party services such as Google Meet to enhance functionality.
Integrating with third-party services such as Google Meet to enhance functionality.
We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share your information with trusted third parties in the following cases:
• Service Providers: To perform functions such as payment processing, data analysis, and customer support.
To perform functions such as payment processing, data analysis, and customer support.
• Legal Compliance: When required by law, legal proceedings, or to protect our rights and safety.
When required by law, legal proceedings, or to protect our rights and safety.
• Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, sale, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business.
In connection with a merger, sale, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business.

• Google User Data Sharing: When authorized by you, we may share data with Google services (e.g., for integrating Google Meet functionality). We comply with Google’s policies on data sharing and protection.
When authorized by you, we may share data with Google services (e.g., for integrating Google Meet functionality). We comply with Google’s policies on data sharing and protection.

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including Google user data, from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:
• Encryption of sensitive data during transmission and at rest.
Encryption of sensitive data during transmission and at rest.
• Role-based access controls to limit who can access your data.
Role-based access controls to limit who can access your data.
However, no method of transmission over the Internet is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

We retain your personal information, including Google user data, only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. When no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize the data. You may request deletion of your data by contacting us at support@learngo.app.
• Access, update, or delete your personal information.
Access, update, or delete your personal information.
• Withdraw consent where processing is based on your consent.
Withdraw consent where processing is based on your consent.
• Object to the processing of your information under certain conditions.
Object to the processing of your information under certain conditions.
To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@learngo.app.
Our Website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those websites and encourage you to read their privacy policies.

Our Website is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.

If you access our Website from outside the European Union, your information may be transferred to and processed in countries with different data protection laws. By using our Website, you consent to such transfers.
We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
